name: Lucifer Fan Game Alpha 1.0
description:
It's the FIRST ALPHA.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls :

Moves : Z Q S D or Directional Arrows

Change camera : C

HandBrake : Space

Enter car : E

Exit car : Double E

Exit : FIN (above the directional arrows)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

With Intel i5 3570k, 12GO RAM, Nvidia GTX 750ti :

In 720p : 110fps

In 1080p : 80fps
